messages.title: My commitments to you
messages.content: I will work with passion and integrity - for a positive Brexit for Wales - for the voice of Ceredigion to be heard in Westminster. I will work with all of our Ceredigion communities to build a positive future and ensure that our housing, health and education needs are met so we can prosper and thrive.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greater equality. Protecting our NHS. Restoring public services. Hedwch a chyfiawnder i gyd. Human and world peace.
Public ownership of a coordinated bus and rail system; deliver social and work needs; provide robust social care; scoped mental health services; combating personal isolation.

Abolishing zero hours contracts; raising the minimum wage to £10/hr; supporting small and medium businesses, apprenticeships and real jobs; establishing public community energy companies and renewable energy initiatives.

issues.economy: Abolishing zero hours contracts; raising the minimum wage to £10/hr; supporting small and medium businesses, apprenticeships and real jobs.
issues.education: Provide learning support at UWTSD, Lampeter.
issues.environment: Public community energy companies and renewable energy initiatives.
issues.health: Robust social care services, mental health services.
issues.labourEmployment: Abolishing zero hours contracts; raising the minimum wage to £10/hr; apprenticeships
issues.transport: Public ownership of a coordinated bus and rail system.

community.content: Public ownership of a coordinated bus and rail system; deliver social and work needs; provide robust social care; scope mental health services; combating personal isolation.
Supporting small and medium businesses; establishing public community energy companies and renewable energy initiatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, I'm a single parent I work part-time on a zero-hours contract providing learning support at UWTSD, Lampeter. I've had to fight all my life and I will fight for you. It is vital for the future of our children and for the safety of our older and more vulnerable people that we vote Labour; the only party that can defeat the vicious ideology of the Tories.

contactInformation.address: Smelting Cottage, Devil’s Bridge, Aberystwyth, SY23 4QY
